page.title: 07School Pupils,5 Rds(survey)
page.content:
We made a survey of Five Rds Primary School that produced the following results.
{75%}of juniors belong to a youth club. {Hobbies} include Collecting,Sport,Gardening,Reading, Riding and TV. {95%}are responsible for their bedrooms and help with household chores. Only{4}children did not own a pet. The average hours of TV time was{26} weekly,with{80%}putting 'THE A TEAM' top. The favourite food of the under sevens is{CHIPS}.Over sevens preferring cooked dinners. {12%}like school,{20%}did not like school and{68%}think school is OK. {72%}like school uniform. {84%}like school rules.
